tool_description: Vybit (VIBE-it) sends personalized push notifications using sounds that you record or choose from thousands of searchable sounds. Put the information in the sound! This API describes how to trigger a specific vyb notification. Learn more at https://www.vybit.net.
name: Vybit Notifications
title: Vybit Notifications

api_list.name: Vyb POST trigger with notification payload
api_list.description: Note that notification parameters included in the post will override the default notification settings for the vyb.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vybit-notifications1.p.rapidapi.com/cpmu3o9mio3xqof2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vybit-notifications1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vybit-notifications1.p.rapidapi.com/{key}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vybit-notifications1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
